param.name: intro
param.label: Introduction
param.description: Introductory paragraph - name of internationalisation string in language file

param.name: map_intro
param.label: Map Introduction
param.description: Introductory paragraph for distribution map - name of internationalisation string in language file

param.name: thank_you
param.label: Thank you for record
param.description: Thank you message displayed after record contribution - name of internationalisation string in language file

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.label: Taxon List ID
param.description: The list ID of the species list you want to allow data entry for.

param.name: taxon_selector
param.label: Method of selecting a species
param.description: Selection of a species can be by auto-complete, a list of pictures, or a treeview

param.name: init_x
param.label: Initial Map X
param.description: Google Maps x value for initial map display

param.name: init_y
param.label: Initial Map Y
param.description: Google Maps y value for initial map display

param.name: init_zoom
param.label: Initial Map Zoom
param.description: Google Maps zoom value for initial map display (0-18)

param.name: map_feature_type
param.label: Feature Type for map
param.description: Name of the WFS feature type that will be displayed on the final page of the wizard as a map.

param.name: geoserver_url
param.label: GeoServer URL
param.description: URL of GeoServer which WFS feature type is loaded from

param.name: website_id
param.label: Website ID
param.description: The ID of the registered Indicia website you are capturing data for.

param.name: password
param.label: Website Password
param.description: The password of the regsitered Indicia website you are capturing data for.

param.name: survey_id
param.label: Survey ID
param.description: The ID of the survey the data should be entered into. If this is blank, then the user will be asked to select a survey during data entry.

param.name: indicia_url
param.label: Indicia Core URL
param.description: URL of Indicia Core Module, excluding the trailing /
